summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3620 for the improvement of 13th Avenue West and 14th Avenue West, from West Bertona Street to West Nickerson Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 44746, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
